title: The Morning Star
verses: The night is wearing fast away,A streak of light is dawning,
Sweet har-bin-ger of that bright day, The fair Millen-nial morning.
Gloomy and dark the night has been, And long the way, and dreary;

metadata.musical_notation: Present with treble and bass clef
metadata.theological_significance: Anticipates the dawn of the millennial morning and Christ as the Morning Star
